name: European Network of Fibromyalgia Associations
goal: Raise awareness about Fibromyalgia and support patients and their families in Europe
interests: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs
euInitiatives: One of the core aims of ENFA is to get the written declaration 69/2008 implemented by the European institutions followed by the national governments and setting Fibromyalgia as a key topic in the European Health Program. This is a very important aim and ENFA will strive to succeed its implementation, as it is in line with the principles and values of the organisation.
